game.name: Rock Snake
game.shortDescription: Rock Snake is a game with classic snake gameplay, but unlike other games, this game has extremely high graphics!

reviewHighlights.text: No cap, Its an actual ASS! All the old Nokia Cellphone devices had it free & did a better job 20 years ago. üêç
